description:
Facebook for Real Estate is learning how to build and manage your new Business page to help drive more brand awareness within your market, capture new leads, advertise your listings/open houses and build a loyal following.

You will learn:

  • Why it's important to have a presence on Facebook from a real estate perspective
  • Step-by-step process of how to build and manager your business page
  • Understanding who is your audience, what content to use to appeal to your audience, how to get better engagement, how to schedule posts, things to avoid
  • Advertising - 3 key ways to advertise - Page Promo, Boosting a post such as an open house or listing and Generating Leads through a CTA
  • Deciphering Insights - who's visiting your page - demographic breakdown; age, region, city, gender, time of days, what content they like the most
  • Things to know when hiring someone to manage your business page
title: Facebook for Real Estate
